name: A pall of grey-green gloom
data: It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
The gloom can be 'pulled' tighter around the wearer's body to increase
